      • getSchedulerLocation

        public java.lang.String getSchedulerLocation(SchedulerServer schedulerServer)
        Description copied from interface: IConfig
        Returns scheduler DNS address. This could be host:port or a dns address for http rest exported by scheduler.
        Specified by:
        getSchedulerLocation in interface IConfig
        Overrides:
        getSchedulerLocation in class DefaultConfigLoader
        Parameters:
        schedulerServer - Rest server started for scheduler.
        Returns:
        url to reach scheduler REST endpoint
